message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start the negotiations. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can we meet in the middle at $10,500?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me. This product has a lot of value that I think you'll appreciate in the long run. How about we settle at $12,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but I really think that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $11,000?
